img_above_text:
![Wukong MiddleHollow 33.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/65/Wukong_MiddleHollow_33.jpg)
There's a ledge nearby that will lead you straight to the next boss (as well as a few Skeletal Snakes we haven't seen since Chapter 1), but first it's a good idea to check the alternate path.
img_below_text:
Before you go, check the ledge to the left of the Shrine to find a **Treasure Chest** with some materials in it.
## Bonevault

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character standing near a wooden bridge in a cavernous area. A red-dotted circle highlights a **Treasure Chest** located on a ledge across the bridge. The preceding text suggests an alternate path leading to the next boss and Skeletal Snakes, while the following text advises checking the ledge near the Shrine for materials in the chest. The image serves to guide players toward the chest's location.
